storyInfo: The Damazti Cluster of all their endless years bares their soul to the young Lord of the Banshees. In the wake of a fire at the hotel, true chaos in Norport finally sets in.

attributes.content: So this time it's Iberia.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Patience, Banshee. These were the most unforgettable days for me.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: I thought you wouldn't like it there.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I certainly didn't like Iberia before that disaster. All that self-aggrandizing, all so self-obsessed. I was through with it.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: They didn't understand fear.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: Whereupon that disaster satisfied you?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: I'm not some twisted psychopath like Old Red-Eye is. The disaster itself was nothing unordinary. When has the land ever been short of disaster?
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: But those creatures fascinated me.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: I've only heard rumors. If I'll be honest, those things duly disturb me.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: They are too removed from us.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Then how removed do you consider me from you, Banshee?
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: You should know, no matter what aspect I take, none of it is the real me.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: Originium leaves an irrefutable brand upon all. It has you walk in the forms you do upon this terra firma.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: But the one thing it forgot was the Damazti.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: Only we still preserve our firstborn form.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: Are you proud of your purity?
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: No, no. With this world in the state it is, what does purity even mean anymore?
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: I can only chase after the changes it brings. I can only chase after you. Chase all you create.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: Every manner of means possible I used. I found in Iberia a wasted town. I moved in there.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: We moved in there.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: We made that town run anew. Work, communication, trade, traffic...
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: Two hundred mes made up one small town.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: I can't say whether you're lucky or unlucky not to have fallen into insanity yet.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Hah. Who knows.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: In any case, the time I spent there left a deep impression on me. With so much to manage, I was drowning every day in it.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: It gave me the false sense... that we lived meaningfully.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: But weariness came in the end, as it always does. Giving my undivided attention to the trivial was very amusing, but even summed all together, it still could not give me the answer I was seeking.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: Until I found them. I heard some call the things 'Seaborn.'
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: I observed them for a very long time.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: They reminded you of yourself.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: No. In terms of unity, we far surpass the Seaborn and their many.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: No matter how many appearances we divide into, we are in the end a whole, while the Seaborn have only the choice of joining with the many.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: But, you know what? I envy them.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: They need nothing more than to heed their instincts.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: Find food, find nutrients, multiply, evolve.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: Perhaps that word you slung just now, 'purity,' should be falling on them.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: While I... I remain where I was, watching it all, watching those variegated little beings assimilate a swathe of seagrass with them.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: They think nothing. They do what they're meant to do.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: And what of us? What are our instincts? And what are we meant to do?
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: Banshee, can you give us any suggestions?
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: Are you laughing?
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: Apologies, Damazti. I am not mocking you, by far.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: They who could proclaim themselves the oldest King of the Royal Court, Their Majesties the Damazti, are simply looking for the meaning of their life.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: It's a very important thing, of course it is. I just never would've thought, that standing before me... was a wayward philosopher.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Would you ever guess the years I've spent a professor of philosophy at Victoria's universities?
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: To you, seeking meaning is easy. Excluding the least minority of existences, life can always be considered brief.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: You find a goal for yourself, to stuff the days full with so that it isn't so tough.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: But we cannot do that.
attributes.name: 'Iberian'

attributes.content: From your suggestions to Theresis's future, none of it holds our interest.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: To us, it is no more than passing the time.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Why do we hold affection for these things that pass in the blink of an eye?
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: We've exhausted practically every possibility, and practically every delight too.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: I'm beginning to pity you, Damazti.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: You've found out we're just some old decrepit nothing gets to anymore, no matter how loud you shout it.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Not many know this secret.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: A few friends of mine taught me this silly game...
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: No, never mind.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Go on, Banshee. We're more interested than you suppose.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Butâ€”you may have to wait a moment. Some bothersome work has come a-knocking.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: Not here, that is, but I'm afraid we'll need to divert a little attention.
attributes.name: Damazti Cluster

attributes.content: What do you mean... not there?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I mean it's not there, for god's sakes!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: The comms post isn't there! There's nothing there! Someone's made off with it!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Was it the Dublinn forces?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Afraid it was long before that. Judging from how thick the dust was, someone must've been eyeing it when Norport was just setting course away from Londinium.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: The Redsteel Guard captain would never genuinely be fooled by us. He'd be very quick to realize the projected message was never sent.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: But at the very least, we're back at the same starting line. We have a renewed opportunity to go for the gold.
attributes.name: 'Trilby Asher'

attributes.content: First there was you for the Duke of Caster, now there's Dublinn's spectre force...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: You've all secretly infiltrated to get onto this plate, which means, you want to keep up Norport's surface appearances.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Without any way to force the dukes' main armies into mobilizing, our plan's dead in the water.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Never try that excuse again, Delphine.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: As long as your duke mother learns you're still here, she'll find some way to save you, won't she.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I can't guarantee...
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Admitting you get along with your mother is nothing to be ashamed of.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.options: Do you have an idea, Ines?

attributes.content: What a pain in the ass.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.options: Looks like you can do it.

attributes.content: ...I really hate that part of you.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: But alright. I can try.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: I need high elevation. Don't get your hopes up.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Miss Ines, how much time will your idea need?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Until sunup.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: Tell Siege and her city friends to get ready.
attributes.name: Ines

attributes.content: May I wish you all godspeed, and I look forward to you choosing the Sunset Street Hotel again.
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: I've spent some wonderful times here, and gotten to know some very fine people.
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: Norport is a lovely, thriving place. Don't let it be reduced to memories and rubble like this.
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: We promise, sir.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There'll come an end to the conspiracy and dispute.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's... a person I truly, truly miss, who once told me...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: That perhaps, one day... everyone on this vast land can fall into peaceful slumber.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: *sigh* There's a back-breaker. This hotel's even messier than it was before.
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: People who don't do their own cleaning never know how difficult it is to maintain a bit of order.
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: Percival! Percival!
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: Where's she run off to now...
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: Fine, go and leave this old codger by himself for a bit.
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: The age-riddled hotel owner finds an equally age-riddled armchair, and opts to find a comfortable position before sitting down.
So that... Cautus girl, she's the King of Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: It's getting harder and harder to keep up with all this change. Even I'm a little shocked by it.
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: Change... change. Maybe I've been slacking on that sort of change myself.
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: Change isn't progress, after all.
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: Alright, about time I bid farewell to this old friend. To tell the truth... I really did love this place.
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: *sigh*... Two more months you should've kept this up, Colbert. Who would've imagined, after two months of the Sarkaz army in the city, an old devil would go from cleaner to hotel owner.
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: I just can't wrap my head around it.
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: The elderly Sarkaz stands up, and scans over the grand lobby of the public house. Every single article in here is near and dear to him.
That Ines Caprinae says war doesn't do metaphor.
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: Well, then. Let's restore its original looks.
attributes.name: Colbert

attributes.content: Upon a finely woven rug that's seen more political players and aristocrats than anyone could know, the elderly Sarkaz drops a lighter lit aflame.
And swiftly, the fires rage high.
The... The soldiers here, were they all killed?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Is the enemy here?! If I'd found this earlier...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Their families will receive compensation payouts. If they have families.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: We have to be on guard...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Do you look like that... because you already knew about this?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: You... This was part of your plan too...
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: It was per Military Commission of Kazdel arrangements.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Sacrifice is unavoidable, mercenary. I thought your captain would have taught you this long ago.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: You're a general! And they're your soldiers!
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Yes. I am a general, and this is my work.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Be it our enemies or ourselves, I must cast each and every life into this gaping maw we call warâ€”
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: And pray it spits out the best ending we could wish for.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: That is all I can achieve in my position.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Youâ€”
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: Hence why I came; I came to give this all my full attention. To look over every pale, young face here.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I must remind myself that this was a decision I made.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: I will not say this is the price the Sarkaz must pay, mercenary.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: The Victorians killed them, but it was I that let them be killed by the Victorians.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Why do you have to do it this way?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: To light a fire.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Light a fire that will extend across this great land.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: And we... the Sarkaz, can find a place for ourselves, the room for us to exist, only on such a divided land.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Mercenary, you must learn to familiarize yourself with it.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Be familiar with it. Hate it. And finally, accept it.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Because this is the only way.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: A bright blaze flames high from the lockdown zone, an old building fiercely burning.
Another... accident?
attributes.name: Paprika

attributes.content: No. That is the first flame.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Mercenary, come with me. We must return to the airship.
attributes.name: Manfred

attributes.content: Our guests have already taken their seats.
attributes.name: Manfred
